title: Beef and Broccoli
tagline: Chinese takeout classic, better at home
description: Beef and Broccoli - Kenji López-Alt tested
ingredients: 1 lb flank steak, sliced thin against grain
steps: Toss beef with 1 tbsp soy sauce, cornstarch, wine. Marinate 15 minutes.
Mix broth, remaining soy sauce, oyster sauce.
Heat wok until smoking. Add 2 tbsp oil. Sear beef 1 minute, stir-fry 1-2 minutes. Transfer out.
Add remaining oil. Stir-fry broccoli 2 minutes. Add 2 tbsp water, cover, steam 1 minute.
Add garlic and ginger, 30 seconds. Add sauce and beef. Toss until thickened.
Drizzle with sesame oil. Serve over rice.
notes: Slice against grain for tender pieces.
